Where is the link to particle/anti-particle coming from nothing in the void? thanks.

post_info.post_title: Where is the link to particle/anti-particle forming in void

Where is the link to particle/anti-particle coming from nothing in the void? thanks.

 Not sure if you are referring to a specific link or just any link. Here is one that talks about the spontaneous formation of virtual particles.
 
 http://www.ess.sunysb.edu/fwalter/AST101/universe.html
 
 There is some mention of it on this page in relation to Hawking radiation.
 
 http://ffden-2.phys.uaf.edu/211.web.stuff/waschke/page6.html
 
 The above is page six that begins at
 
 http://ffden-2.phys.uaf.edu/211.web.stuff/waschke/main.html
 
 Try a google search on particle-antiparticle.
